Title: In a Lonely Place
Plot: Hank attempts to find a love interest for Becca's teacher. Charlie uncovers Marcy's secret which could have fatal effects on their finances.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick, Ezra Miller, Justine Bateman, Colin Malone
